701193f-b.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - Van Cortlandt Avenue
701193f-b.text:
Grand Concourse, west side, north from but not including Van Cortlandt Ave., to and including East Mosholu Parkway South. Also shown is the elevated structure of the I.R.T. Van Cortlandt Park subway line running
on Jerome Ave.
May 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701193f-b.folder: Grand Concourse & Van Cortlandt Avenue, Bronx, NY

701958f-a.title: Bronx: Van Cortlandt Avenue - Grand Concourse
701958f-a.text:
Van Cortlandt Avenue, west from Grand Woncourse to Jerome Avenue (I.R.T. elevated structure thereonJ, showing the thoroughfare after it had been repaved by the W.P.iA.
Jan. 27, 1937
W.P.A. Photo
Five Boroughs eroject
